formattedAddress: UnionDerm, 4 W 58th St 10th floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: UnionDerm, 4 W 58th St 10th floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Chopra at Union Derm. He is an incredibly talented, warm, and personable physician.

I‘m extremely happy with my Botox. My face looks so much more refreshed and dewy, while also maintaining a very natural look. I also love the subtle lift of my eyebrows. The other times I’ve had Botox done by others, my brows have always dropped a bit - he is the first person who knew how not to do this.

Dr. Chopra also performed a Thermage treatment on my eyelids. He made me feel very comfortable throughout the whole procedure. Two months later, my eyelids and eyebrows are so much tighter and lifted, and overall my eyes look brighter and more refreshed. I am very happy with the results.

He’s also a laser expert and I’m excited to see him for more treatments in the future!

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Chopra for my first experience with both botox and laser treatment, and I must say, it was an outstanding experience. Dr. Chopra's expertise and proficiency were truly impressive.

From the outset, Dr. Chopra displayed an exemplary level of professionalism and attentiveness. He took the time to thoroughly address all of my concerns and ensured that I felt comfortable throughout the entire process. His patience and willingness to walk me through the available options were greatly appreciated.

What set Dr. Chopra apart was his commitment to understanding my unique lifestyle and tailoring the treatment to suit my specific needs. This personalized approach instilled a high level of confidence in our decisions.

I am so happy with the results of the treatments and will definitely be returning to Dr. Chopra for future treatments. Without a doubt, Dr. Chopra's expertise and genuine care for his patients make him a standout in his field. I wholeheartedly recommend his services to anyone seeking top-notch care and impeccable results.

originalText.text: As a male that has been previously inexperienced with Botox, I appreciated Dr. Chopra’s considerate patient care and guidance throughout the process. He treated me in areas like my forehead and eyes and addressed the crows feet and I was extremely happy with the results.

originalText.text: It was my first time visiting anyone for my concerns Dr Chopra absolutely understood my apprehension and put me at ease. He was very attentive , patient and walked me through all the options I had. He took the time to understand my lifestyle and what would work best for me.  We chose the Sofwave treatment and now 3 month later I am seeing the results we had expected. We also did a Botox treatment. Dr Chopra is an amazing dermatologist with extensive knowledge in his field. I highly recommend Dr Chopra.

originalText.text: Dr. Chopra is the absolute best!! I went to him for botox in my masseters and lip filler. It was my first time getting any injections, he was very attentive and made me feel comfortable the whole time. I wanted a fuller but natural look and he nailed it -- couldn't ask for better results! Definitely recommend going to Dr. Chopra for any of your cosmetic derm needs!
